1060880.name: FIRST STAR DOWN
1060880.description:
FIRST STAR DOWN is a space adventure where you (Natalie Haines) are helping the crew of the E-SRV Pathfinder research an inexplicable deep-space signal. You follow Natalie Haines as she leads a research project to finally determine where the signal is coming from and what is causing it… Could the signal be a space anomaly? Is it a natural phenomenon? Or is humanity about to make first contact? No one knows what the signal is, but many think that it will usher in a new era for humanity.

FAQ


How is the game played: Point the mouse and click to have Natalie move around the scene or to interact with other characters and some items.

How much playtime is in the game? Average playtime is around 2 hours.

Is this a puzzle game? No, there are very few puzzles in this game. The puzzles are interwoven into the story. Being part of the story is the main purpose of the game.

What is the E-SRV Pathfinder? Pathfinder is one of the newest vessels deployed by the Extra-Solar Research Unit. They conduct space research and exploration outside of the colonized systems.

Is the crew nice? Yes, they are nice people and very professional. You'll enjoy talking to them... even Dillon, if you don't mind conspiracy theories.
1060880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
